thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Hotel Mercedes - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Would stay again
thread.title_full: Would stay again - Review of BEST WESTERN Hotel Mercedes, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jamie S
title: Would stay again
text:
Positives
Clean room, quiet suburb, coffee machine in room, helpful staff, close to subway, short walking distance from arc de triomphe
Negatives
Poor wifi on floor 4, slightly small rooms, small lift
Overall this hotel was great, room sizing wasn't an issue as our days and nights were spent exploring the city. Wifi wasn't great in our room, however, worked fine in reception so online check ins etc weren't an issue. A major positive is the near by metro station which is clean and feels safe even late at night, it is also very easy to use.
